name: .V5PYTHON File Extension
summary: Learn about .V5PYTHON files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open V5PYTHON files with VEXcode V5. The app is available on various platforms, including Windows, macOS, Android, iOS, Chrome OS, and in a web browser. To open a V5PYTHON file, select File â†’ Open from within VEXcode V5.

Since V5PYTHON files contain plain text, you can also open them with any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (macOS), and gedit (Linux). However, text editors do not provide the same editing capabilities as VEXcode V5.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
